title: Ep44: Tommy Flowers & Colossus
itunes:title: Ep44: Tommy Flowers & Colossus
itunes:subtitle: This veteran special is based on Peter's Imperial War Museum interview with the remarkable Tommy Flowers - the man who built the Colossus computer that cracked the German codes in the Second World War. Tommy Flowers is a different type of hero, and...
description:
This veteran special is based on Peter's Imperial War Museum interview with the remarkable Tommy Flowers - the man who built the Colossus computer that cracked the German codes in the Second World War. Tommy Flowers is a different type of hero, and this episode includes excerpts from the interview with the man himself.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.
